alert.note: Alert for La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 1:57PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east-central San Juan County in Utah through 230 PM MDT... At 155 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monticello, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 70 and 76. U.S. Highway 491 in Utah between mile markers 0 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Grand Junction.
